body:
Crashes on launching RA.

<details>

```

Red Alert mod version git-bae322db4

Operating System: Linux (Unix 4.15.0.45)
Runtime Version: Mono 5.18.0.240 (tarball Wed Jan 16 09:10:16 UTC 2019) CLR 4.0.30319.42000
Exception of type `System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException`: The given key 'Neutral (0)' was not present in the dictionary.
  at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2[TKey,TValue].get_Item (TKey key) [0x0001e] in <04750267503a43e5929c1d1ba19daf3e>:0
```

Could you add a testcase? I'm afraid to set it up wrong but would like to test.

This is afaik a bit broken, i had to furter test but i was incapable of downloading an updated dependency (i have been copy-pasting thirdparty folder from older installations) after rebase because of the shitty internet here. Tho i got some mobile data so i guess i should go test now.
Actually, rebase seem to be fixed the issues i noticed while doing older tests. I'll try to think of a testcase for the conditions and add it.
